item.description:
In Tony's slightly condensed words he's interested in sharing a presentation about:

 

"... Three20 framework integration with iPhone/iPad applications, as well as maybe talking about a roll-your-own authentication mechanism for integration with services such as Facebook, Twitter and others.

 ... I think people would get some value from learning about a real world implementation of the Three20 framework. There is so little documentation about it available."


Please consider installing the Three20 framework, giving it a look and some attention, and bring your experiences and any questions that may arise.

Thanks again to Tony for offering and to you for trying to make it to the meeting,

Brian
item.how_to_find_us: Up the elevator to the 3rd floor and into the office across the hall.
item.why: Tony Lewis of Taknology will share a look into the Three20 framework for iOS used by the Facebook app. Here's a link to where you can download the framework for free: http://three20.info/
item.name: Integrating Facebook & more into apps w/ the Three20 Framework
